channel.title: Roman 728 pvp || fast switchs || 2012 rs || redportal pking || 24.7 || dung!
channel.description:
[CENTER][B]Roman-Empire 728[/B]
[B]"One of the most advanced PvP/Economy server out there"[/B]
Bring back your RuneScape 2012 pking experience with Roman-Empire NOW!
Roman gaurantees to satisfy you with an enjoyable pking experience, However, you may also be a skiller, but the server is a mostly pvp based server, but the skilling is all there. Roman Empire is frequently updated with new updates and such. It is 24.7 online with a decent vps (We will soon have one of the really good ones) Roman empire use to be a 517 server, It was a pvp server with over 100 players on daily! It is now coming back alive as a 728! Roman Empire is finally back! Make sure to vote every 12 hours to help server progress.
[B]Roman-Empire update log [/B] *Pictures are little outdated, will update the pictures shortly with the new sever updates. Also, the server has been progressing super fast, dont be scared to get dropped.:)
*All 25 skills working with a customized dungeoneering for skillers. (We accept skillers)
*Nothing like Tizen.
*We will have forums shortly after it's fully ready. Join the forums when it's out! Link will be: Roman728.com
*Dungeoneering 8/16/2015
[left][left][b]**ATTENTION**[/b][/left][/left] The pictures won't upload for some reason, so if you want to see pictures just go here. [url=http://www.tinyurl.com/roman728]www.tinyurl.com/roman728[/url]
ROMAN-EMPIRE (JAR) CLIENT [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/az9o6hmc0bbxfby/Roman-Empire%20PvP.jar?dl=1]https://www.dropbox.com/s/az9o6hmc0bbxfby/Roman-Empire%20PvP.jar?dl=1[/url]
ROMAN-EMPIRE (ZIP) CLIENT [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/az9o6hmc0bbxfby/Roman-Empire%20PvP.jar?dl=1]https://www.dropbox.com/s/az9o6hmc0bbxfby/Roman-Empire%20PvP.jar?dl=1[/url]
[CENTER][B]Current Staff Members [/B]
[B]Owner[/B]
Bruno
[B]Administrator[/B]
Open
[B]Player Moderator [/B]
Outlawkillaz
Open
[B]Support Team[/B]
Open
Open
[B]Forum Developor[/B]
Bruno
Open
[B]Forum Moderator[/B]
Open
[B]Server Features [/B] -Killstreak System/Rewards -Upgradable Items/Royal crossbow -Co-op Slayer -Player owned house -List of PvP titles to choose from -Vote4Tokens -25+ functioning bosses! -White portal/Red portal clanwars home -Revenants Cave, Glacors Cave -2012 old items look default -Dicing & Flower Gaming -Pvp clans/lots of PvP/multi areas -Achievement Diary & Rewards -Spawnable Gear/Pking Sets to choose -High Risk Arena -PvP points/Triviapoints/Chest/Rares and more shops! -Rare Drop Announcements -15+ Minigames to choose from -Random events[/CENTER]
[CENTER][B][URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/az9o6hmc0bbxfby/Roman-Empire%20PvP.jar?dl=1"]Roman-Empire Client (JAR)[/URL][/B] [B][URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/4gu5zw8c77eamou/Roman-Empire%20PvP.zip?dl=1"]Roman-Empire (ZIP)[/URL] [/B][/CENTER]

item.description:
@bdasilva97 wrote:

[CENTER][B]Roman-Empire 728[/B]

[B]“One of the most advanced PvP/Economy server out there”[/B]

Bring back your RuneScape 2012 pking experience with Roman-Empire NOW!

Roman gaurantees to satisfy you with an enjoyable pking experience, However, you may also be a skiller, but the server is a mostly pvp based server, but the skilling is all there. Roman Empire is frequently updated with new updates and such. It is 24.7 online with a decent vps (We will soon have one of the really good ones) Roman empire use to be a 517 server, It was a pvp server with over 100 players on daily! It is now coming back alive as a 728! Roman Empire is finally back! Make sure to vote every 12 hours to help server progress.

[B]Roman-Empire update log
[/B]
